definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: This resembles volcanic ash, which is predominantly composed of minerals such as pyroxene and olivine.
sentences.chinese: 這類似於火山灰，這是主要組成礦物如輝石和橄欖石。

sentences.english: The morphology of diopside is dendritic and the plagioclase is spherulitic.
sentences.chinese: 透輝石爲枝晶，斜長石爲球粒晶。

sentences.english: The pyroxene in matrix is crystaled last.
sentences.chinese: 最晚晶出的是基質中的輝石。

sentences.english: Cumulate orthopyroxene occurs almost from top to bottom of the section.
sentences.chinese: 堆積的斜方輝石几乎自下而上地分佈在整個剖面中。

sentences.english: The diopside is not of certain relation to the metallization.
sentences.chinese: 某些礦牀中發育的純透輝石層與成礦不具必然聯繫。

sentences.english: Diopside rock is a functional raw material for high frequence porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 透輝石礦是高頻瓷的一種實用原料。

sentences.english: Discussed the influence on performance of sanitary ceramics glaze caused by spodumene.
sentences.chinese: 論述了鋰輝石對衛生瓷釉料性能的影響。

sentences.english: And the diopside deposit of Tianshui is a good resource place for saving on energy.
sentences.chinese: 天水後裕溝透輝石礦牀是很好的節能礦物原料基地。

sentences.english: a green transparent form of the mineral spodumene used as a gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 一種透明的綠色鋰輝石，用作寶石。

sentences.english: The composition of the protolith is also one of the main factors controlling the composition of clinopyroxene.
sentences.chinese: 另外，原巖成分也是控制單斜輝石成分的主要因素。

sentences.english: The roasting and leaching behavior of spodumene in sulphuric acid process was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 採用硫酸法對鋰輝石焙燒浸出工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: The manganhedenbergite can be considered as an important ind-cator for Pb-Zn metallization.
sentences.chinese: 錳鈣鐵輝石可以作爲鉛鋅礦化的重要標誌。

sentences.english: Star Diopside is mainly mined in India and is generally a black or blackish green color.
sentences.chinese: 星芒透輝石主產於印度，通常爲黑色或黑綠色。

sentences.english: Chaoshan gold deposit is directly related to augite diorite.
sentences.chinese: 朝山金礦牀與白芒山輝石閃長巖有直接的成因聯繫。

sentences.english: This paper induct the major benefits of using spodumene in sanitaryware glaze.
sentences.chinese: 利用鋰輝石在衛生瓷釉中的應用及其優點。

sentences.english: No pyroxene or olivine has been found.
